# Redirect language-less routes to default language (for SEO)
/sounds              /english/sounds              301
/leaderboard         /english/leaderboard         301
/savedsounds         /english/savedsounds         301
/memesound           /english/memesound           301

# Preserve memesound with ID parameters
/memesound/:sound_id /english/memesound/:sound_id 301
